website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary dinnerware set that goes great with family dinners and casual affairs.
pros: Durable, affordable set that is great for everyday use and for entertaining at casual events
cons: Plates are square and some people will hate that

customer_reviews.title: If you want to make a mosaic buy these!
customer_reviews.text: They get 1 star because they are pretty dishes and honestly you can give them none. They do say that get hot in the microwave but I was not prepared for just how hot they truly get. I bought 2 sets and I'm now down to about one set. Just stacking them up in the cabinet chips them or accidentally knocking them against something in the dishwasher. Every bowl has at least one chip and the plates are not much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Banks

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple plate set, and sure enough, two of the beautiful bowls were broken. I have never used Amazon's customer service before, but I will say they were absolutely wonderful, and helpful and made it right, and then some... very pleased with these plates colors are just like the picture. Bowls are real bowls, that hold alot of cereal ; ) wonderful addition to my black and grey and silver kitchen. Thank u amazon for fixing my situation so quickly (24hrs.) I am one happy customer : )
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Deep, beautiful colors, each piece is perfect size, they begin to chip almost instantly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the primary color in my kitchen is red. I like the look and glze feel of this set. However, had the brand been stated in the listing (it wasn't when I purchased these), I would've passed. Elite brand items tend to chip from just setting them down on the table. Out of 16 pieces, 7 have chips,3 of which have never been used. Stylish set, though.
customer_reviews.author: OneryPrincessTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love! After reading mixed reviews I decided to go ahead and purchase anyway because these were available in my favorite color and appeared to be durable. I took various pictures as I was unpacking. I checked each piece for chips and cracks and I found a couple of questionable spots on two plates but it was not chip or crack, just what I call a natural indentation barely noticeable. I used them at breakfast this morning and my husband and I are well pleased. They are large enough to satisfy his needs and pretty enough to satisfy mine.
customer_reviews.author: C Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Chip easily but otherwise great, until a plate exploded.
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews really but these plates leave me no choice - as other reviews mention, these are a massive chip-magnet but once I'd unpacked and begun using them, I didn't really want to go through the hassle of returning them. They scratch pretty easily and while they do look good, I'm very concerned about their durability. One of the plates just exploded in my microwaves after less than 2 minutes of being heated and this worries me. I'm returning mine and going back to Corelle cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diffrent shades
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and feel of my bowles and small plates. The large plates was a complelty diffrent color of blue. A small chip in a bowl and small plate with no damage to packaging. I bought the red ones and they were all the same color but diffrent amount of black dots
customer_reviews.author: Joshua King

customer_reviews.title: ordered 2 sets. Ones perfect.. one is broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these dishes and as much as I loved the picture.. i loved the first set. The second set arrived and the box looked ok.. but what was inside was a mess. It must have been dropped, kicked and dropped again because three of the dinner plates were broken, two mugs have no handles and everything else has chips in it . I'm devastated. If the seller would respond to my issue I'd have given them a better review.. but i've heard Nothing and instead of service for 8 .. i have service for 4 and a the makings of a mosaic.
customer_reviews.author: Graceful

customer_reviews.title: It Chips Easily
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design and color and the weight. I ordered two (2) 4 PC. place set. One dinner plate and one dessert plate have already chipped, after just one use. This disappoints me very much as the description states it is hard to crack or break.
customer_reviews.author: Eva L Langley

customer_reviews.title: chip easily
customer_reviews.text: Six months after we bought them they are so chipped that we got rid of them. Started noticing a few chips within a week and should have returned them. Our last set of plate lasted 10 years. I will not buy Gibson again.
customer_reviews.author: 3474family

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dinnerware and immediately noticed the material used to create the dinnerware is too soft and becomes damaged if it is impacted in a minor way. So far in the short time I have owned this set three cups and two plates have been damaged, I don't recommend purchasing this set. I only purchased it because it is my girlfriend's favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great dishes, but NOT oven safe
customer_reviews.text: The description of these dishes don’t say they are oven safe, but the bottom of the plates do. I’ve put them in the oven quite a few times and most of the time it’s fine, but two have broken in the oven at 350 degrees in less than 10 min. My previous stoneware was oven save and I never had a problem. Other than this issue, I really like the dishes. The Amazon description is correct (it doesn’t say they are oven safe), but the plates themselves contain false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: brenmir

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful dishes, and they arrived a day earlier than expected. However 2 of my large plates arrived broken. Otherwise all the other dishes are in perfect shape and are very durable. The mugs are just fine in the microwave and the dishwasher, none have chipped on me yet or anything of the sort. Very excited to have them minus the 2 broken plates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) Great set of dishware
customer_reviews.text: After 50 years of Round plates, somehow the food tastes different on these square ones :) Great set of dishware, reasonable price and they look great! I never heard of Gibson Plates before, until i ordered these. When they came and I was throwing out my 25 year old set ( that was still in great condition, just missing a few pieces due to breakage and a few cracks) i turned one over and low and behold, they are Gibson Too! Fast shipping, though they did split the order for some reason Dont hesitate buying these.
customer_reviews.author: First Last

customer_reviews.title: Love these, but some warping
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if these were warped when we got them and I didn't notice or if putting them in the dishwasher caused the warping, but a few of the plates are a little warped at the rim. We're not particularly fancy, so it doesn't bother us that much, but it was a bit of a bummer, since we love this stoneware set so much.
customer_reviews.author: snipeTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: NOT Oven Safe
customer_reviews.text: Despite being advertised as oven safe (and it being marked as such on the back of the plates), these dishes are not safe to put in the oven. I put one of the dinner plates in the oven at 250 degrees, and it exploded. Luckily it does not appear that it damaged my oven, but the fear is obviously that someone could get very hurt by putting these dishes in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: THESE CHIP QUICKLY!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these dishes, but within 2 months they began to chip, showing 1/2 inches. Every few weeks there are new chips. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hugatree737

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, hoping it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dish set! I was a little weary when I ordered Forest green/black, because the name doesn’t really match the color in the picture. The picture makes the set look more teal, which is what I was hoping for. The color is true to the picture and looks really nice in our kitchen. I ordered 2 sets and they both arrived without any damage. We have had them for a little less than a month and one of the bowls has a small chip, I’m not sure how but I’m hoping it doesn’t happen to any of the other pieces. Overall I am very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Look great but get brittle and break!
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to say I cannot give a good review of this set. They say they are oven and dishwasher safe. However, they become brittle after using in the oven. Even with a short reheat in a toaster oven. Two of my small plates have broken in my hands while gently rinsing to place in the dishwasher. They look great and fit my style but I have lost two small plates and a bowl, due to them breaking. Now my set is incomplete; which sucks because I have a large family and I purchased two sets. There are not enough pieces now. I will have to shop elsewhere for a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Montero

customer_reviews.title: Not at all durable.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more disappointed. We've had the dishes less than 2 weeks, and 2 plates have already chipped, just with everyday use. Our last set was 20+ years old, and not once, did any of the pieces chip; not once.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary of ordering these, because I saw some of the reviews mentioning that they were breaking easily. But they'd been on my list for almost 7 years now, so I took the plunge and I personally can report no breakage whatsoever. I don't know if I got lucky and got a particularly durable set or something, but I have dropped a cup, smacked a plate on a corner by accident, and they've been in the microwave and dishwasher. Still no chips or breaks! I really like them a lot, and the price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on first use
customer_reviews.text: I have to clobber these in the reviews. I just bought four sets. The inside of the bowls are all scratching from regular eating utensils. You can scratch the inside by simply dragging a utensil over them, which means you’re eating that material. This is super bad and probably very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Equatorialthoughts

customer_reviews.title: Unique Eats
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, loooove my royal blue set of plates/dishes! Since I’m a single man, I wanted the theme of my kitchen to rock hints of dark, royal blue and black so when I saw this set on Amazon, I snatched it up swiftly. They’re so easy to handle, pop in the dishwasher when done and load on top in my cabinets when clean again. Of course, like all ceramic, you must handle and care with care...but these plates are not delicate and/or chip easy.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Move on- don’t buy these ones
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with purchase. These dishes started chipping off large pieces just after a couple uses. You cannot fit the plates nicely in dishwasher because of curved edges, so they take up more space in order to get clean. I’ve already replaced these dishes as of July 2020 and I only purchased them in March 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and feel
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful plates. Didn't rate durability yet. I have a problem with payes and bowls chipping and looking forward to seeing how these do. I purchased the teal set as well as a purple set as I have a large family. Update.. got the purple set and as the shape and sizes are the same the outside of the bowl and coffee cup are black with purple on the inside.. not quite the look I was going for when I set the table.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Brogdon

customer_reviews.title: I have provided 5 stars because the dishes are nice and the service I was provided exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I received my dinnerware and though there was a chip on one dessert plate, I contacted the company and they quickly provided me with simple instructions on what I needed to do to obtain a replacement. The customer service representative was quite professional and genuinely kind. I have provided 5 stars because the dishes are nice and the service I was provided exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy These. Not Microwave Safe.
customer_reviews.text: It's been several months now, and while they arrived chipped, I was still happy with my purchase at first. They had been on sale anyway, so I didn't mind the chips; I'm not awfully picky. That was my first mistake though. I should have returned them right then and there, but they were so pretty (and also were my first full set of dishware I've ever gotten myself), I didn't request a return/reshipment. Fast forward to today, and one of the plates I had in the microwave just cracked right in half. So much for "Microwave safe". Not worth the money, I guess it's back to thrift store dishware for us. Thanks a lot Gibson.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Not something I would ever buy again
customer_reviews.text: So I waited a bit to write a review. I am glad I did because people need to know that these dishes will chip very easily even stacking them in the cupboard they chip. Every piece has chips the bowls and plates. Also these are extremely heavy so if your looking for lightweight these are not for you. To bad its too late to request my money back. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Fox

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and it looks great!
customer_reviews.text: 1. You will feel sophisticated if you have these in your home - although it is a budget set - 5 Stars for presentation 2. Has slight knicks but for the price ignorable - 4 stars 3. Will it hold up to the microwave test? Lots of complaints here about it cracking in the microwave so we shall see...but first impressions are really good - so definitely somewhere in the middle of stardom stars
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are much smaller than what the description
customer_reviews.text: Please see my picture and read the advertised description of the sizes. As of July 29, 2020, the size of the ROUND dinner plate was described to be 12.75", dessert plate = 9", bowl = 6.25". The actual size of the plates and bowls are much smaller than advertised. Luckily, Amazon was kind enough to resolve the issue, but PLEASE update your descriptions!
customer_reviews.author: MattMN

customer_reviews.title: Chips easily
customer_reviews.text: Plates chipped the 3rd day . I should have sent them all back. Also they don't wash well. Perhaps it comes out better in a dishwasher. Mine looked dull. Since 2 plates 2 cups are already chipped they are sort of useless for my needs. I say don't buy them. I was very careful with them storing them with the corrugated cardboard they came with separating each dish. Not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Rudaleholt

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the dinner plates day-to-day. They are too heavy and way too big for a dinner-portion of anything. They are very pretty. I've dropped them in the past 1.5 years and they hold. I'm giving 4 stars because I bought 2 sets and just almost never use them due to their weight. It is just not for everyday use for my weak-(you know). I do still use them to plate food. Freaking pretty and my kind of purple. I do use the bowls, baby plates(don't know what they are officially called) and cups day-to-day. I broke 3 bowls, I don't even know how... so durability gets a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Andriana DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Colors represented in photos are wrong
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I was surprised to see that the backs of the dishes are clearly sage in color, almost olive. The colors on my iPhone showed GRAY. Maybe the tiniest hint of green. In actuality, the color is definitely in the green family, no grey. The front of the dishes are a pale cream color, not white as most photos suggest. The bowls and coffee mugs are both square-ish circles. That wasn’t clear in the photos either. Two of the plates had olive trim on the front that was painted horribly, as if by a ten year old. The rest were painted fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Snarkitect

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: I love these dishes as the complete set looks really nice, but at an amazing price. This is a better price then you can find at discount stores, but even better quality. An issue I have sometimes with sets, its the sizes and the bowls are nice and deep, along with the plate sizes are the perfect size. I washed, scrubbed and put these in the dishwasher and had not had any issues. Even dropped the bowl on the floor and it didn't break, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality!! Cracked on first use!!
customer_reviews.text: Put a large plate in the microwave for a minute and a half and it cracked in half. Was the first time using it!! Look great but are terrible quality. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J.

customer_reviews.title: Love how big they are
customer_reviews.text: My husband always complained about our other plates because they weren’t big enough for a steak and sides so he’s very happy with these. The bowls are huge, especially for kids to use, and I wish the smaller plates were a bit bigger, but otherwise these are good. They’re fairly heavy for a plate which I like, but one bowl has already chipped within a month of use due to it slipping in my son’s hand and hitting another one. The purple is also a bit too dark to be as vibrant as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Dishset.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a few months ago. My girlfriend was very skeptic as she doesn't generally trust online purchases. She recently moved out so when I gifted these to her she wasn't expecting these to last as long as they have. I cannot tell you how many times she has dropped the bowls or roughly handled the plates when putting them away. Upon inspection there have been no scratches from utensils or dishes clinking together. I would recommend these dishes as a good starter set to anyone planning on buying dishsets either for yourself or for others as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed *update*
customer_reviews.text: got 2 sets of these for myself for Christmas and the plates break in the microwave....is there anyway to get replacements??????...... lost another plate today 7-22-19 wanted to get replacements but have not got and answer if you replace the plates....i do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: donna barrett

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: After one minute 55 seconds in the microwave, THIS happened. Amazon is taking care of it, but beware it isn't as microwave safe as they claim. Otherwise a gorgeous set.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Every piece completely shattered
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to be honest, I only opened the first box of plates inside the main box of dishes. The main box was un-damaged upon delivery and I was excited. I searched for a couple months to find exactly what I wanted for our new home and found these. Upon opening, this is what I found. Every single dish was completely destroyed and in pieces. I closed the box back up and have messaged the company, awaiting instructions to return now. I am heartbroken 😞
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Not good if you plan to use them.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, they chip extremely easy. Within a week 4 pieces were chipped and it got worse from there. We’ve had these for a little over 4 months and 2/3 of the dishes are chipped and just look junky. There are 3 adults in this house, one adult almost never eats at home. These are NOT chipped due to abuse. They looked great for a few days then the chipping began. I’m very disappointed. We redid our kitchen and bought everything to match including these dishes. They don’t look nice at all in a new kitchen. We’re throwing them away and shopping for newer, better quality dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mistie

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: I would be sending these back if it weren’t such a hassle packing them back up. One of the cups has a blob of ceramic at the upper edge....I thought I could live it. One of the plates had just a small scratch/blemish on it...again I told myself I could live with it. But when 3 of the bowls had slight chip marks on them...I got miffed. I know they are not the most expensive dishes, but it’s the first time I’ve purchased dishes that aren’t melamine/plastic. I wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Oda Mae

customer_reviews.title: Not microwave safe.
customer_reviews.text: Had these plates for less than two weeks, the first time placing a bowl in the microwave for 30 seconds to soften butter, there was a loud splitting noise from within the microwave. bowl cracked. other than that, this product does a fine job, but who buys non microwaveable dinnerware? I'll reach out to the seller to see their response, and provide an additional star should they have good customer service. as it stands, I would not recommend these based on the fact the first trip the the microwave showed a defect in the product.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: pretty and heavy
customer_reviews.text: True to color. They look very nice. They're heavy. I've had less than 6 months and have lost 1 large plate and 1 bowl due to breakage. I wash washing the plate by hand in the sink and it slipped from my left hand a little and hit the sink divider and broke the plate it surprised me and I noticed a bowl with a crack through it when I went to go use it one day so I'm not sure when or why it was cracked. But meh they're nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Acid Cannibal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique dish set.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy I bought these. I was looking for something stylish and unique and these fit the bill. I think they look much more expensive than they are. Since they’re stoneware and somewhat large, they are heavy. They came packaged well and were in perfect condition. They seem durable so far and come out of the dishwasher great. They are a true black and darker type of red/burgundy. If you’re looking for a bright red then these are probably not a good fit. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karsh22

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a little over a while. Three of my plates were cracked when they arrived. Plates scratch easily. Bowls are wonderful though. Loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I searched around for weeks before finally making this purchase. The color on them is amazing exactly what I wanted. I found some chips and scratches but after reading the reviews I expected that. Honestly this purchase was for my brand new home so I didn’t have very high standards for it. I would definitely recommend this if you’re going to use these plates for day to day not special nights. I will more than likely be purchasing another set just to have them because I really do love their color and size.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dishes. Great price. They are heavy since they are stoneware and slip easily while washing. Also believe all the reviews that tell you they chip. We have only been using these for a couple weeks and one has a major chip while others have gotten a few scratches just from being in the same sink being washed. I ignored the reviews that said they chip because I really really liked the colors. I will use these until I can’t and then buy something more durable. I love the colors but hate the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cobie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Good quality nice set
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these because I have a set very similar to these from the company better homes so I figured they would be about the same ...they truly are!! except the sizing is a little bit different ...the bowls are a little bit bigger the plates are a little bit smaller and then the mugs are a bit smaller than the regular ones I have ...but the color matching is absolutely on point it looks like it came with the set I originally bought.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin & Lynn

customer_reviews.title: They look nice, but arrived damaged...
customer_reviews.text: They overall look nice and weighty for the price, but they arrived with one of the plates chipped in the edge and some black specks (not a part of the pattern) on another plate. Little disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent color glaze on pieces
customer_reviews.text: I had bought two Bella Soho sets hoping to replace my old Gibson set that had lost too many pieces. Unfortunately while well constructed, the blue glaze finish on the pieces were inconsistent. The ranged from a lighter blue on the small plates to a dark blue on the large ones. The mugs and bowls ran somewhere in between. This was true for both sets. Neither matched the pictures on the product page. Pretty enough if you don’t care about your dishes matching. I returned these and bought the Gibson Soho Lounge set, which became available again. Not only are they cheaper, but they were all consistently colored.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyoshi

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and the Beast
customer_reviews.text: I'd bought this set -as a gift- for my grandmother. She had planned to use them -for the first time- during one of the final two 2018 holidays. Upon removing them from the box -yesterday, 12.23.2018- she and a few others loved and complimented the beautiful style. The quality appears nice, though we're not sure of normal use durability yet, because -unfortunately, upon removing them directly from the box- one of the saucers has the surface of a red edge missing. I was so embarrased. Only four stars seems unfair, for the seller, but five stars seems unfair to my gift purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TrojanPeace

customer_reviews.title: NOT MICROWAVE SAFE
customer_reviews.text: (BUYER BEWARE) Before I purchased this set I looked at the reviews and with the description it says microwave safe. These ARE NOT MICROWAVE SAFE. I’ve only had these dishes a week and now we have a crack on one of the full size plates just because it says it’s ok to put this in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Gibson Elite Bella Soho Dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice 16 piece dinnerware . The color is a bit dark in person. However, it comes with 4 cups, 4 dinner bowls, 4 small plates and 4 large plates that are squared. These bowls are a bit deeper than any ordinary regular bowls. The cups are perfect for espresso or regular coffee, they come out clean. The smaller plates are perfect for small sizes of food like cake not perfect for big meals. The larger plates are for the bigger meals but a pinch big. I think this set should of come with medium size plates but overall perfect for 2 people or 4 people.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Skarsgård

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Set of Dishes!!
customer_reviews.text: I received second set of dishes today. I really love these dishes!! I didn't see any imperfections in this set, the first only a few unnoticeable ones. They were packed well with no broken pieces. I did notice the different decals on back of dishes. The first just had Gibson Co. information and made in China. The second has Elite added to it with Gibson Co. in smaller print and that they are designed in California. They also seem to be a lighter in weight than first set. There's no difference in color between the sets. They both are very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Michele J

customer_reviews.title: Broken during shipping
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets cause we have 5 people in the house so a set of 4 just isnt enough. The 1st set that came had 3 broken bowls and 2 broken dinner plates with the other 2 dinner plates missing altogether. They're super cute and perfect for my new color scheme but I would have been way happier if they came in undamaged instead of me having to wait an extra week. Nice and heavy but Salad plates are really small. I guess that's okay since my kids dont like salad anyways 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: tiffany vanburen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. 4 dinner plates with imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Two sets were purchased for me as a Christmas present. I was so excited and wanted to love them. Upon unpacking, I was sad to see that 4 dinner plate had slight to major imperfections (The major one had lots of bubbling on the edge). The salad plates, mugs and bowls all seem to be fine. I love the color, they are heavy. I am concerned about the other reviews on this. Not quite sure if I will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J

customer_reviews.title: They're very heavy without food on them. Not for people with weak hands/wrists. Otherwise, great
customer_reviews.text: Biggest note: Strudiness gets 5 stars, lightness gets zero. They're heavy for sure. And as such they chip easily when accidentally hit against each other...like when putting them in the dishwasher. Just be careful and you're fine! Oh and I wouldn't suggest dropping these suckers on a toe. If you have weak hands/wrists i wouldn't recommend them at all. They're heavy on their own ... I have to have my hand (not just fingers) close to the center to hold it with one hand. With anything on them it's impossible and i dont have weak hands.
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think they'd be this sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've been babying them when washing them until I dropped a large plate on top of one of the small ones in the empty sink. I was shocked to see that neither of the plates suffered any damage! I love the look of them and they fit my decorating scheme perfectly. I'll buy Gibson Home again.
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: I Just Love, These Dishes... They are very beautiful And Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: To say that I was shocked, when these arrived... is to say the least! I am so glad that I purchased two sets. These are replacing some Stoneware Dishes (Maplehill Stoneware), that are over twenty five years old, and still in good condition. They are so pretty, I had to find something that was as pretty or more... These are just that! I am thinking about buying more of the bowls, they have a set of bowls and a serving dish that would accompany this set beautifully! You will not regret it ,if you buy theses dishes! They are heavy and you can feel them in your hands!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon13

customer_reviews.title: Some problems
customer_reviews.text: The glaze has some imperfections and poc marks. They say dishwasher and microwave safe but one of The big dinner plates just cracked as i was microwaving my lasagna only for 3 minutes. They've held up good for a few months now maybe this one was a dud. I will update if any more of them crack. I held a flashlight behind the plate so you can see the crack. Threw this one away. They are quite heavy plates. The color is nice but uneven not a straight red. Even though these are flashy I prefer my old plane white plates. Made in China..
customer_reviews.author: Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you like big portion sizes. They're study and don't seem to scratch very easily. I found out after I got them that they're too big for my microwave, so that was disappointing. My microwave is a pretty standard microwave, so keep that in mind when purchasing these. The bowls are extremely deep. All pieces of this set are pretty heavy compared to most dinnerware I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: For the price not bad so far
customer_reviews.text: In response to other reviews as mine goes: it came in one manufacturer original box from China. Nothing was chipped but the packaging was only cardboard. Everything made it through the dishwasher in one piece. I ordered the blue. The color is definitely more like the lighter second picture than the darker blue of the first. The painting around the edges from black to blue look like they were done by a school art class. Small bubbles and other imperfections in the glaze throughout. But for $60 what do you expect? This sounds weird but each piece feels brittle, I will be very careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Pretty plates but I find hard to wash. All plates that I have seen have ridge all the way around on bottom. Normally about two inches from the plates edge. Makes it so you can grab and hold onto the plate as you wash it. But with these plates the ridge is much further in and very difficult to safely hold on to when washing especially when the plate is wet and soapy Also I am a diabetic with nephropathy in my hands which makes the task that much more difficult. I won't buy any more
customer_reviews.author: Rocky V. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Looked Good New but Prone to Chipping
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these dishes about 3 months ago. They have been in daily use since then. The order, delivery and condition of the delivered dishes was great. In use I have found these dishes to be somewhat prone to easy chipping. I thought it was my careless placement of them in the dishwasher at first but recently I just bumped the edge of the bowl with my spoon on the way to a scoop of ice cream and a chip fell out. Also, if you have a Miele dishwasher or other euro sized dishwasher these plates won't fit unless you lean them over.
customer_reviews.author: 1seven

customer_reviews.title: Make individual replacements a thing please!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They look great, and function just like they're supposed to. One of the bowls chipped a week after I got them, probably because someone wasn't careful. I would like to see individual replacements available sometime so that one can replace broken dishes more easily/readily. I am less inclined to replace until I'm low on dishes since the whole set is so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R Van Matre

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, high quality set!
customer_reviews.text: Simply gorgeous! High quality, stunning glaze on this ironstone set. Of course they're heavy- but I knew that going in. The mug size and thinness of lip are just right for me (10-12 oz?) The plate derving size an be 'normal' and fit in the slightly indented round middle of the plate or heftier serving without looking wrong/overloaded. The bowls are huge! Not cerial size! Perfect for a 15 oz can of soup with room not to spill. I c oui uldn't be happier. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cyl

customer_reviews.title: The red is muted
customer_reviews.text: I expected the red color to pop with the black offset but was kind of disappointed that the red is very muted and doesn't really stand out. I had bought a single plate somewhere else and thought these plates would match, but the one I had was a bright red where as this is closer to a dark burgundy. Good dishes, just not what I expected from the representative pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Retinen

customer_reviews.title: Good set for 2 people @ a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent set of dishes. Seems sturdy and durable. Easy to clean off and so far not all scratched up. Dishwasher safe is also a good thing. Perfect set for 2 people. Would definitely recommend to friends/family and would give as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap dinnerware with some issues.
customer_reviews.text: This dinnerware set looks nice. I got a set for Christmas and bought a second myself to have more plates. The colors were pretty consistent (I got the red set), but the shape/concave-ness was not the same. The first set was a fair bit flatter than the second set I bought. The second set does not stack as nicely nor do they fit in the dishwasher the same way. Beyond that, expect to see some slight imperfections in the plates, from scratches to nicks and dings along the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love the dishes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter for her wedding they were the perfect color and sturdy they are a bit heavy however this is her taste. They do take up a lot of room in the cabinets so you should take that into account if you have only a small area to store them. I seen a set that is blue and I think I'll get that one for me since I do like the style and the dual colors seem to complement each other. My daughter and her new husband say they love them
customer_reviews.author: betallen

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: These are easily the best plates, bowls, and cups I have ever owned. The red glaze is amazing and hasnt cracked or faded yet after several months. These are not light plates. They arent super heavy but they are not light. This isnt a downside for me though because they hold up super well in the dish washer and microwave. Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: ClownPrinceChaos

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Dishes arrived unbroken. Did have one plate with some scratches but that's it. No they are not all perfect but are still quite nice looking and a good value. There are some color differences between the different pieces but not extreme.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of these, mainly for the color. Things I noticed in these is the branding fades off the bottom of the dishes. Also I had 4 of the big plates break on me. I have a large family and we mainly use the larger plates. I looked to see if I could purchase the plates separately and sadly there is not an option for that. So I am down 1 set of the larger plates. Also, some of the dishes chipped easily and so now have some dishes with chips in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Like the colors !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Perfect size and fits in my dish washer. Seems durable. Portion size is also very good. I like the color combination and different color options. I think it is fairly priced too. I would recommend this product. Update- took 2 stars off as didn’t turn out to be as strong. Had to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: sanjog

customer_reviews.title: Gray square Gibson set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my rv so bought several months ago but just took out of the box. One bowl is chipped. The chip isn’t in the box that contains the bowls. I believe is was shipped that way. Too late to rerun. Nice set. Hard to Load In dishwasher because of the shape because of shape and size. I will be hand washing in rv anyways. Pretty color (gray)
customer_reviews.author: Bettesue

customer_reviews.title: Bowls hold a can of soup with room for crackers!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive to say the least. They are sturdy and so far as unbreakable as those brands known for their durability. These dishes have been knocked off the island and counter onto weed floor in the kitchen by accident more than once and not so much as a chip anywhere. My favorite is that you can fit a can of soup in the bowls without it overflowing and still have room for crackers. They are super easy to clean by hand and seem to dry faster than other dishes. They inspired me with its sleek and modern design to update my glassware and silverware that I also purchased here on Amazon that I am thrilled with.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Best dishes ever
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy when I received my dishes their really pretty and durable the bowl is large enough for your vegetables or other side dishes plates and salad\bread dishes are plenty big enough for the big eaters my daughter loves them and asked to trade sets of corse I said No. the only con I found is trying to rest your fork or knife on the they fall into the plate and thats not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, clean style
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, a darker shade of gray than the picture shows but ultimately happy with how they look. Shipped in a larger box filled with bubble wrap to really secure the package inside. Gibson/elite great quality you can hand wash or put them in the washer they can take a daily wash routine with no problem. This is my second set, first set was in black with cream. Nothing happen to them just wanted a gray set to match my dinning room table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Muted glaze, quality control issue, but still pretty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the red and black set. I already had the Gibson mosaic set and liked it. On opening, I found one coffee mug to have a defect in the handle. Looked broken, but it is not --just the paint and glaze is flawed badly. Seems to be a qualty control issue with the manufacturing. I did not really need the coffee mugs, so one missing is not a deal breaker for me. I found that the glazing on the outside of this red and black set is not shiny, its very dull/muted compared to my mosaic set. The photo online made the outside seem more shiny. The inside/eating surface is a shiny glaze. I like the set overall.
customer_reviews.author: KDB61

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishes, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love these dishes but they are so heavy. I really liked the shape but they are somewhat bulky and hard to handle. In all fairness though, I am 66 and do have problems with the strength in my hands. Will continue to use them because I really do like them, but please keep this in mind if you plan on purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but cracked quickly.
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful and affordable. I checked them closely when opened them at arrival for cracks. I didn't cook food much on them but when I did they weren't really hot however 2 plates already have chips in them barely a month afterwards. I would buy another set but might find some that mix and match of different brand.
customer_reviews.author: LRM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews where the complaints were that the dishes weren’t “perfect”. I received my set in great condition. They packaged them wonderfully! No chips, no breaks. I found a couple small imperfections but nothing so noticeable that they are unacceptable. The color and style are awesome. The size of the dinner plates and the bowls are fantastic! I would definitely recommend them since my experience has been good.
customer_reviews.author: chrissie r

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong, if you're looking at these dishes!
customer_reviews.text: Oh gosh - I just love these plates! They are gorgeous and very durable. The only thing I notice is because of the glaze or something they getsuper-slippery when I am washing them. This has led to two minor chips, luckily on the bottom of the same plate! They are much larger than I expected, though I didn't look at the measurements. I love them so much, I'd almost buy another set just to replace my chipped plate, or for other situations I might need more place settings!
customer_reviews.author: RBK

customer_reviews.title: lovely dinnerware !
customer_reviews.text: I think this set is very pricey for a16 pc set ! Also, this item plus another 16 pc set was a gift to my granddaughter, each box had either a cup or a plate that was chipped ! My granddaughter loves this pattern and did not wish to return for replacement . I do not recomend shipping this stoneware ! Purchase in store if possible .
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Love them! But be sure to check for cracks...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I love the design of this dinnerware set. Actually, we liked them so much in the pictures that we ordered two full sets in gray... They arrived this afternoon, and we both really like the looks, feel, and size of the pieces. But sadly, one of the bowls arrived cracked (see picture). I'm going to pursue a fix with Gibson... Hopefully, they will send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: SCUBAfanatic

customer_reviews.title: Good Dishes for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Spiffy colorful plates come in a unique square shape. The dark red color is certainly eye-catching. The plates themselves do tend to chip on the edges, so maybe only use them for every day wear or better yet, special occasions. I use these when I have guests over for and serve Italian. The color seems to go perfectly with a marinara sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor13

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, variable
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty, I like the color and shape. I'd I had to fault the dishes, it would be inconsistency in color between pieces (small plates are lighter blue) and one large plate was chipped/lacking glaze. It is minor enough for me to just deal because I don't want to go through hassle of a return. I did verify I was sent the Bella Soho and NOT the Soho Lounge (there's some price difference and color difference). I will likely buy another set as I need service for 8. Hopefully, the colors will match.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: The shipping packaging is terrible, but the dishes are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are B E A U T I F U L and seem like they'll be a great set for our home. Unfortunately it looks like I may have to order two sets of these dishes in order to get one full and complete set. The packaging used to ship these devices is thin and provides next to no security and safety of these dishes, which means when I opened the box there were a handful of my dishes in pieces, one piece from each set to be exact. Otherwise, I am happy with what I got...
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great plates with no issues.
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for these before buying that said they chip too easily. Despite this we bought some anyway just to give it a shot. We haven't had any issues at all. Great plates, stand up to silverware, stacking, the dishwasher, and the Microwave. We picked up the Blue/Black and Red/Black and love both of them. Honestly, fantastic plates at a great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R

customer_reviews.title: Great product, heavy for those with arm weakness to wash
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product for the price point. Heavy ceramic, so if you have arm weakness it might not be a good idea for you as washing can be difficult. But very durable. The big plates are more than enough portion wise and the smaller ones we use for the kiddos and they more than suffice. The coffee cups could stand to be a bit bigger, however.
customer_reviews.author: Maarii Quinn

customer_reviews.title: There very pretty,durable and can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: This dishes are beautifully durable heavy but not to heavy I love um I bought 2 set's that way if i do break one i can go to my boyfriend's house and switch it lol
customer_reviews.author: Liz Conley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sturdy Dish Set For 4
customer_reviews.text: Aloha Amazing Amazon Shoppers. I Love these dishes! Sturdy, nice weight, beautiful red design and dishwasher safe. My old porcelain white dishes broke in move here to Phoenix Arizona. Thank you Amazon and Mr. Jeff Bezos! Your the Man Bezos and FYI SIR. The joke within the IRS is Mr Jeff Bezos DOESN'T KNOW WHEN THE TAX DEADLINE IS!! Mr Bezos pays NO TAXES! Capt Stanley J Howard IRS Enrolled Agent
customer_reviews.author: Stanley. J Howard IRS ENROLLED AGENT

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional, but big.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of these; a plate was broken in one of two boxes in the original shipment. Quickly replaced during return process. Deducted one star for poor packaging (clearly not designed to withstand the rigors of residential shipping and delivery - it’s a miracle any of them arrived in one piece), and for size of the bowls; they’re HUGE, which limits their use. Way too big for a serving of salad or soup. Big enough to serve spaghetti and meatballs in though!
customer_reviews.author: T. Vex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a black plate set but didn't want something plain so when I saw this I had to get it because it goes with my black and red color scheme for my kitchen. It came quick and it looks exactly as described and it had no chips or scratches whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: At'Tifa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great style/color and portion sized dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve waited to review since there are so many different experiences for many. I really loved the color and style and wanted them to be great. Well they are!! I haven’t had any issues in the dishwasher or microwave. None have cracked or faded and I went ahead and ordered another set so I would have enough for a party of 8.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole-KC

customer_reviews.title: The color is coming off these plates I'm so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my beautiful plates in May and already in August the paint is coming off the center of the plate attached is a picture so that you could see this I would like to have my money refunded these traits could be poisonous to my family I would like to be compensated
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Love these dishes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for the right set of dishes and found these. I ordered the teal ones and was hoping that the color would have more green in it. I was very happy when they arrived and are the perfect color. I ordered three sets and there were not chips at all. I'm very happy with my purchase. We've had these for a few days and my son's friend dropped one of the plates and it didn't break. Yay!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Penney

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: One of the bowls came chipped. The bigger plates and coffee cups are a lil on the heavy side. Other then that it's a very nice set. Color is bold and beautiful. I would buy another set for a gift or myself if I knew for sure 100% they would come in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Viles

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the plates but less than a few weeks in they are already showing sign of wear, a few plates are already cracked, I'm very disappointed, I bout 2 orders and now I'm going to have to buy new sets.. I've used them normally, dishwasher, microwave, hand washing, won't buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Peter mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the plates. I wish you could just purchase them separate from the mugs and bowls. After a couple of uses they already have chips, some so large that I had to throw out the plate. Disappointed in the quality. I’m afraid to put them in the microwave after seeing what happened to other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gibson Elite Vintage Soho Lounge Square Reactive Glaze Stoneware Dinnerware set, Service for Four (16pcs), Blue
product_meta.description: Size:Bella Soho| Color:BlueGibson Elite Blue Vintage SOHO Lounge dinnerware set features classic stoneware dinnerware. The set has a black exterior and is made from ceramic material. Durable thick dinnerware is difficult to scratch or break. 16Piece stoneware set includes four place settings Each of 12. 75-Inch dinner plate, 9-inch dessert plate, 6. 25-Inch bowl and 12 Ounce mug (plates and bowls measured diagonally). bold designs for the bold at heart. Traditional finishing techniques produce differences in color, Size and texture, ensuring no two pieces are exactly alike. Set is dishwasher and microwave safe for easy clean.
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL DESIGN: artisanal stoneware featuring two-tone blue interior and black exterior double reactive glaze.
WHATS IN THE BOX: Service for 4 that includes 4 of each of the following: 12. 75” Dinner Plates, 9” Dessert Plates, 6. 25” Cereal Bowls and 12 Ounce Mugs.

DOUBLE REACTIVE GLAZE: reactive refers to a technique how multiple colors within the glaze react together to create a dreamlike, vibrant quality to the colors and hues. Due to the reactive nature of the glaze, each stoneware piece is unique.

FAMILY OWNED: Gibson Overseas, is an industry-leading producer of tabletop and housewares products based in Los Angeles, California. Family-owned for over 40 years, we’ve developed a portfolio that thrives off relentless commitment to style, innovation, and value for our consumers around the world.

VINTAGE SOHO: The original 3 colors from the Vintage Soho Lounge Collection! The combination of Soho Lounge’s beautiful modern look and incredible value makes this set a must have for nearly everyone and every occasion. The durable stoneware and reactive glaze make these sets difficult to scratch and break.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: this glossy and smooth stoneware is not only strong but also dishwasher and microwave safe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars7,752 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
